entities.description: "Mississippi is a state experiencing a water crisis during the summer of 2022."
"Jackson is a city in Mississippi facing a water crisis, with issues of leaky pipes and economic decline."
"Moss Point is a location in Mississippi where defunct water meters are found."
"Siemens is a German corporation that promised to install modern water meters in Jackson to boost revenue and fix infrastructure."
"King Charles III is the monarch of Britain who has been diagnosed with cancer."
"Wisconsin is a state where basic operations at prisons have deteriorated, leading to violence, lockdowns, and escapes."

"The Crown is a TV series whose costumes and props are being sold by Bonhams."

"Boeing is an aircraft manufacturer that is under scrutiny by the Federal Aviation Administration after an incident with a 737 Max jet."

relationships.description: "Siemens promised to help Jackson's water system by installing modern water meters to boost revenue and fix infrastructure."
"Jackson is a city in Mississippi that is facing a water crisis."
"Defunct water meters are found in Moss Point, which is related to Jackson's water crisis."
"Jackson, a mostly Black and Democratic city, has been allegedly starved of resources by state officials who are mostly white and Republican."
"Jackson is described as a mostly Black and Democratic city, indicating the political affiliation of its residents."
"Bonhams is selling costumes and props from the TV series 'The Crown', indicating a connection between the auction house and the show."

entities.description: "Los Angeles is a geographical location mentioned in the context of a potential weather emergency with heavy rainfall."
"Chile is a country in the southern hemisphere that has been suffering from drought for a significant period."

Benjamin Netanyahu, also known as 'Bibi', is the Prime Minister of Israel, facing unpopularity and corruption charges, with his political future in question. He leads the Likud party, which is part of his ruling coalition in the 120-member Knesset, and has survived many previous predictions of his downfall.
"Hamas is a political and militant organization that has been involved in conflicts with Israel, including the attack on October 7th."
"Israel is a country in the Middle East, involved in conflicts with Hamas and seeking a two-state solution with Palestine."
"Palestine is a region involved in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, with discussions around a demilitarized Palestinian state."
"Antony J. Blinken is the U.S. Secretary of State, involved in diplomatic efforts in the Middle East, particularly regarding the Gaza Strip conflict."
"Saudi Arabia is a country in the Middle East where Antony J. Blinken met with the crown prince as part of his diplomatic push."
"Mohammed bin Salman is the crown prince of Saudi Arabia and de facto ruler, meeting with Antony J. Blinken to discuss the Gaza crisis."
"The Gaza Strip is a region where a war between Israel and Hamas is taking place, with discussions around a ceasefire and humanitarian needs."
"Egypt is a country that Antony J. Blinken plans to visit as part of his diplomatic efforts in the Middle East."
"Qatar is a country that Antony J. Blinken plans to visit as part of his diplomatic efforts in the Middle East."
"The West Bank is a region that Antony J. Blinken plans to visit as part of his diplomatic efforts in the Middle East."
"Likud is a political party in Israel led by Benjamin Netanyahu, which is part of his ruling coalition."
"Jackson is a city in Mississippi that faced significant water crises in 2021 and 2022, affecting its residents and infrastructure."
"Washington represents the United States and its efforts, led by Antony J. Blinken, to address the conflict and humanitarian needs in Gaza."
"Bezalel Smotrich is a leader of one of the far-right parties that form part of Netanyahu's coalition, contributing to his continued power."
"Itamar Ben-Gvir leads another far-right party included in Netanyahu's coalition, helping to keep him in power."
"Syria is mentioned as the location of a military base used by American troops and allied forces, which was struck by a drone, killing Kurdish fighters."
"The Syrian Democratic Forces, a Kurdish-led group, reported the drone strike on a base in eastern Syria and blamed it on an Iran-linked militia."
"Iran is implicated in the drone strike on the base in eastern Syria through its links to the militia group blamed for the attack."
"Mississippi is the state where Jackson is located, and where state officials are criticized for their role in the water crisis."
"The Republican party is mentioned in the context of state officials in Mississippi, who are mostly white and Republican, criticized for their role in the water crisis."
"The Knesset is the legislative branch of the Israeli government, where Netanyahu's coalition holds 64 seats out of 120."

entities.description: "The New York Times Company is a media organization that published this article on February 6, 2024."
"Ukraine is a country in Eastern Europe that is currently at war with Russia, as mentioned in the article."
"Vuhledar is a location on the eastern front line in Ukraine where Ukrainian troops are outmanned and outgunned."
"Volodymyr Zelensky is the President of Ukraine, who announced plans for a major overhaul of the country's military and civilian leadership."
"Russia is a country that is currently engaged in a war effort against Ukraine, as mentioned in the article."
"The United States is a country that may provide much-needed military and financial assistance to Ukraine, as mentioned in the article."
"Kyiv is the capital of Ukraine, where leaders are waiting to see if the United States will provide military and financial assistance."
"Gen. Valeriy Zaluzhny is the top military commander of Ukraine, whose position was discussed in the context of a potential shake-up in leadership."
"Rai News is an Italian media outlet where Volodymyr Zelensky expressed the need for a reset in Ukraine's leadership."
"Donald J. Trump is the 45th president of the United States, who left office and is mentioned in relation to using a seal for his statements."
"Margo Martin is one of Donald J. Trump's closest personal aides, involved in the discussion about the use of a modified seal."
"Scott Gast is a lawyer who was consulted about the acceptability of a modified seal design for Donald J. Trump."
"The Great Seal of the United States is referenced in the context of a modified seal used by Donald J. Trump's team."

"Shane Goldmacher is one of the journalists who wrote the article about Donald J. Trump's use of a seal and his post-presidency behavior."

"An atmospheric river is a meteorological term for an unusually strong storm that brought record-breaking rains to California."
"The Pacific Ocean is mentioned in relation to its high temperatures contributing to the formation of an atmospheric river."
"Los Angeles is a city in California that could be deluged by the equivalent of a year’s rainfall in a single day due to the atmospheric river."
"Climate change is discussed as a factor that can intensify both rain and drought, contributing to disasters in Chile and California."
"Wildfires are mentioned as deadly disasters that have killed more than 120 people in Chile."
"Mudslides are mentioned as disasters that have occurred in Southern California due to record-breaking rains."
"A severe heat wave is mentioned as a contributing factor to the wildfires in Chile."
"Drought is mentioned as a condition that has affected Chile for the better part of a decade, contributing to the wildfires."
